mapper.select: SELECT * FROM system_group WHERE name ${checkName} #{byName} AND useful != ${useful} ORDER by id,permission_id;
mapper.update: UPDATE system_group SET sys_modify_date = #{sys_modify_date}, sys_modify_user = #{sys_modify_user}, name = #{name}, permission = #{permission}, note = #{note}, useful = #{useful},nbdesc=#{nbdesc} WHERE id = #{id} AND permission_id = #{permission_id};

UPDATE system_group SET permission_control =system_permission.control, permission_group = system_permission.group_name, permission_name = system_permission.name FROM system_permission WHERE system_group.permission_id = system_permission.id;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM system_group WHERE id = #{id} AND permission_id = #{permission_id};
